title: Bug 132786: Value2 is not cleaned after converting operator from between to equal in highlight rule
OB: When converting the operator from between to equal in a highlight rule, the value2 field should be cleaned.
EB: Bug 132786: Value2 is not cleaned after converting operator from between to equal in highlight rule. Description: Value2 should be cleaned after converting the operator from between to equal in a highlight rule.
SR: Steps to reproduce:  1. Save the report and view the generated xml source.  Expected result: The value2 field should be cleaned in the highlight expression in the xml source.  Actual result: In the xml source, the value1 is 1 and the value2 is 3.
